title: Does this picture show a "skinhead cop with a right tattoo " who captures a Jewish protester?
subtitle: Interested social media users put on a controversial tattoo worn by Elizabeth, New Jersey, a police officer at a demonstration in June 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A photo posted on social media in mid-2019 shows a police officer with a "head of skin" with a tattoo of "right-wing militia."
